attributes.action: pay the  working members of society two thirds thier current salary when searching for jobs due to redundancy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i think the government should offer grants or pay job seekers allowance at a rate which reflects the current wage rate a person is on when he/she becomes redundant.  Even if people were offered a government loan to soley pay mortgages for a year which can be repayable from future wages at a reasonable rate.  maybe this would prevent decent hard working people from losing thier homes and give them the oppurtunity to find work without burying them selves in more debt.
